programme.title: Problemista
programme.desc: An aspiring toy designer from El Salvador attempts to bring his unusual ideas to life in New York. As time runs out on his work visa, a job assisting an erratic art-world outcast becomes Alejandro's only hope of staying in the United States. Comedy, starring Tilda Swinton, and Julio Torres, who also wrote and directed.

programme.title: The Persian Version
programme.desc: Leila, an Iranian-American, is the only daughter of a sprawling immigrant clan living in Noughties Brooklyn. She trembles under the weight of honouring her parents, Ali Reza and Shireen. A lesbian marriage is met with disapproval and Leila channels her anger into a dream of becoming the next acclaimed film-maker. When Ali Reza requires a heart transplant, Leila is reunited with her eight brothers and the rest of the brood. Comedy drama, starring Layla Mohammadi, Bijan Daneshmand, Niousha Noor and Tom Byrne.

programme.title: Wildhood
programme.desc: After discovering that their mother could still be alive, two lads make a run for a better life, finding community, identity and love along the way. Drama, starring Steve Lund and Michael Greyeyes.

programme.title: The Glorias
programme.desc: The story of feminist icon Gloria Steinem's itinerant childhood and its influence on her life as a writer, activist and organiser for women's rights worldwide. Director Julie Taymor's biopic, starring Julianne Moore, Alicia Vikander, Ryan Kiera Armstrong and Lulu Wilson, who all portray Steinem at different points in her life. With Janelle Monae and Bette Midler.

programme.desc: Two pirate radio DJs in 1970s London find their friendship coming to an end as they head in different directions. Social drama, starring Valentine Nonyela, Mo Sesay, Frances Barber and Sophie Okonedo.

programme.desc: Twelve-year-old Owen sees an advert for a new TV show, The Pink Opaque, which airs late on a Saturday night when he is supposed to be in bed. Writer/director Jane Schoenbrun's horror thriller, starring Justice Smith and Brigette Lundy-Paine.

programme.title: Dorian Gray
programme.desc: A naive Victorian man unthinkingly sells his soul for eternal youth, wishing that a portrait of him should age instead. Horror, based on Oscar Wilde's novel, starring Ben Barnes, Colin Firth and Ben Chaplin.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: Authorities open a cold case of the disappearance of Carol Lubahn.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: The mystery of a Florida hotel owner's disappearance confounds family, friends and the detectives investigating the case.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: The five-year investigation into the death of a retired corrections officer, who was killed by antifreeze poisoning, reveals multiple suspects.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: Two tenacious sisters determined to fulfill a promise investigate the mystery surrounding their mother's death.

programme.title: Dateline NBC

programme.desc: A DNA breakthrough in a murder case that is more than a decade old leads two determined detectives to surprising suspects.(n)

programme.title: Dateline NBC

programme.title: Dateline NBC

programme.title: Dateline NBC

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: A love triangle leads to years of stalking, property destruction, threats, and murder.(n)

programme.desc: The Portokalos clan are back and as boisterous as ever, this time planning a renewal of vows for patriarch Kostas and wife Maria. Comedy sequel with Nia Vardalos.

programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding 3
programme.desc: Join the Portokalos family as they travel to a family reunion in Greece for a heartwarming and hilarious trip full of love, twists and turns.

programme.title: Just Friends
programme.desc: Successful businessman Ryan Reynolds returns to his hometown to win the heart of his high-school sweetheart, who rejected him 10 years earlier. Romcom with Amy Smart and Anna Faris.

programme.title: Along Came Polly
programme.desc: An ultra-cautious man's life is turned upside down by a disastrous honeymoon and an encounter with an adventurous childhood friend. Ben Stiller and Jennifer Aniston star.

programme.title: Wimbledon
programme.desc: After losing his ambition and dropping in the rankings, a pro tennis player meets a young star on the women's circuit who helps him recapture his focus for Wimbledon.

programme.title: How To Lose A Guy In 10 Days
programme.desc: Matthew McConaughey bets he can make reporter Kate Hudson fall for him, while she does her womanly worst to turn him off. Comedy. Strong language/sex references.

programme.title: Anyone But You
programme.desc: After an amazing first date, Bea and Ben's fiery attraction turns cold. Until they find themselves unexpectedly reunited at a wedding in Australia. Starring Sydney Sweeney.

programme.title: Crazy Rich Asians
programme.desc: When an NYU professor heads to Singapore with her boyfriend, she's surprised to learn he's from an extremely wealthy family... who aren't so approving of her. Hit romcom.

programme.title: The Five-Year Engagement
programme.desc: Almost-perfect couple Jason Segel and Emily Blunt are set to get hitched, but life and its endless obstacles get in their way. Romcom. Strong language/sexual references.

programme.title: Captain Phillips
programme.desc: Drama based on a true story, starring Tom Hanks. A tense stand-off ensues between Captain Richard Phillips and Muse, the leader of Somali pirates who hijack his container ship. But both men are also subjected to outside political forces.

programme.title: Black Hawk Down
programme.desc: War drama based on real events, starring Josh Hartnett, Ewan McGregor and Tom Sizemore. On 3 October 1993, elite US troops were sent into Somalia's capital, Mogadishu, to capture two lieutenants working for the local warlord responsible for orchestrating a famine in the region. The ensuing 15-hour battle saw the deaths of nearly 20 American soldiers, and hundreds of Somalis, after two Black Hawk h

programme.title: Fight or Flight
programme.desc: Action comedy starring Josh Hartnett and Charithra Chandran. Ex-CIA agent Lucas Reyes is tasked with boarding an international flight in order to identify and apprehend a mysterious hacker. However, the job grows infinitely more complicated when Reyes realises the plane is stuffed with assassins all battling to take down his target - and kill him in the process.

programme.title: Tarot
programme.desc: A group of students unknowingly release an unspeakable evil trapped within a cursed deck of tarot cards. Horror, starring Harriet Slater, Adain Bradley and Jacob Batalon.

programme.title: Sweethearts
programme.desc: Two college freshmen break up with their high school sweethearts during one chaotic night before Thanksgiving. Comedy, starring Kiernan Shipka, Nico Hiraga, Christine Taylor and Jason Babinsky.

programme.desc: A look ahead to the films now playing on Sky Cinema, plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: American Star
programme.desc: Out to kill a man he has never met, Wilson, a seasoned assassin completing his final assignment in Fuerteventura, is drawn to a ghostly shipwreck. Thriller, starring Ian McShane, Nora Arnezeder and Fanny Ardant.

programme.title: Lee
programme.desc: Biographical drama starring Kate Winslet. Co-writer/director Stephen Cookson's comedy, starring Diane Keaton, Hayley Mills, Patricia Hodge, Lulu

programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding 3
programme.desc: Following the death of her father Gus, Toula Portokalos honours his dying wish to take the entire family to his childhood village and reconnect with their Greek roots. programme.title: Vanilla Sky
programme.desc: Romantic fantasy thriller starring Tom Cruise, Cameron Diaz and PenÃ©lope Cruz. After a night of flirtation with the beautiful Sofia, a violent encounter with an obsessive ex-girlfriend leaves playboy David Aames badly disfigured and facing a charge of murder.

programme.title: The Color Purple
programme.desc: Musical adaptation of Alice Walker's novel, starring Fantasia Barrino and Taraji P Henson. In early 20th-century Georgia, young Celie is forced to marry the tyrannical farmer "Mister". For years, Celie's life is bleak and difficult, but when Mister's mistress, the spirited jazz singer Shug Avery, comes to stay, Celie begins to believe in herself.

programme.title: Get Away
programme.desc: A family's holiday to a remote getaway takes a lethal turn when they discover the island they're on is inhabited by a serial killer. Director Steffen Haars' comedy horror, written by and starring Nick Frost, with Aisling Bea and Sebastian Croft.

programme.title: The Shamrock Spitfire
programme.desc: Co Dublin-born fighter pilot Brendan Finucane, known by his colleagues as Paddy, hones his skills in the RAF during the Second World War, eventually becoming the youngest wing commander in its history. Biographical drama, starring Shane O'Regan, Ryan O'Grady and Sophia Eleni.

programme.title: Hancock
programme.desc: Action comedy starring Will Smith, Charlize Theron and Jason Bateman. The life of superhero John Hancock is on the skids; despite having saved countless lives, he's mostly remembered now for destroying property while flying around drunk. But after he rescues PR executive Ray Embrey from the path of a train, Hancock is offered the chance of repairing his tarnished image.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible 2
programme.desc: Action spy thriller sequel starring Tom Cruise. Impossible Mission Force agent Ethan Hunt is on the trail of his rogue former colleague Sean Ambrose, following the theft of a synthetic virus capable of wiping out the world's population. In an effort to get closer to Ambrose, Ethan is accompanied on the mission by the renegade agent's former lover.

programme.title: Mean Girls
programme.desc: High school outcasts Janis Sarkisian and Damian Hubbard narrate the tale of 15-year-old Cady Heron, who moves back to America from Kenya with her mother. Janis encourages Cady to infiltrate the Plastics, ruled by the formidable Regina George, but when she does, the clique soon corrupts the new girl. Musical adaptation of the 2004 cult classic, starring Angourie Rice, Renee Rapp, Auli'i Cravalho, a

programme.title: Meg 2: The Trench
programme.desc: Underwater rescue expert Jonas Taylor leads a research team on an exploratory dive into the deepest depths of the ocean. However, a greedy mining operation threatens the team's safety and unleashes a school of voracious 75ft-long megalodon sharks. Director Ben Wheatley's comedy thriller sequel, starring Jason Statham and Cliff Curtis.

programme.title: Madame Web
programme.desc: Superhero action adventure starring Dakota Johnson. While on a dangerous job, New York paramedic Cassie Webb has a near-fatal accident and develops precognitive powers. When she foresees that three young women are in danger, she sets out to protect them from the super-powered villain who wants them dead.

programme.title: Barbie
programme.desc: Satirical fantasy comedy starring Margot Robbie and Ryan Gosling. When blonde and bubbly Barbie experiences a series of sudden crises, she must leave Barbieland to track down her human owner and make things right. But the adoring Ken follows her to Los Angeles where he discovers something called the "patriarchy" and develops some radical ideas...

programme.title: Wonka
programme.desc: Musical comedy prequel to Roald Dahl's Charlie and the Chocolate Factory, starring TimothÃ©e Chalamet. Young Willy Wonka yearns to produce his own confectionary, but finds trouble in the form of a shady cartel of chocolatiers and a mysterious thief.

programme.title: Twisters
programme.desc: Action adventure starring Daisy Edgar-Jones and Glen Powell. Five years after a storm-chasing tragedy involving a group of her friends, meteorologist Kate joins a team investigating unusual tornado activity in Oklahoma. There, they encounter a rival posse of "tornado wranglers" led by the cocky Tyler, who clashes with Kate as the "twisters" intensify.

programme.desc: Walter Keane (Christoph Waltz) achieves worldwide fame for pop-art portraits of saucer-eyed waifs, but no one knows that it's his wife, Margaret (Amy Adams), who's the real genius behind the paintbrush.

programme.title: Succession
programme.desc: Roman and Kendall do a "routine health check" of a new media brand to help Vaulter to determine the future of the company; Tom tasks Greg with sniffing out waste at ATN; Connor and Willa host a soiree to mark their return to New York.

programme.title: Succession
programme.desc: Logan informs his management team of his plan to make another attempt to acquire a rival media company; Greg worries his meeting with a Logan biographer puts his standing with the family at risk; Connor's presidential announcement irritates Logan.

programme.title: Succession
programme.desc: Roman begins a six-week management training program; Connor and Willa attend the funeral of a family friend with a complicated past; Logan and Kendall arrange a covert meeting with PGM CEO Rhea Jarrell; controversy surrounds a star anchor.

programme.title: Succession
programme.desc: Logan attempts to solidify his buyout of PGM at a weekend retreat at the Pierce family home; Shiv, Roman and Connor veer from their carefully orchestrated roles; the Pierces question whether an alliance with Waystar Royco will tarnish their legacy.

programme.title: Succession
programme.desc: As Logan looks to finalize a deal to buy the Pierce family's papers and TV stations, a threat to the deal arises from an unexpected quarter; Tom worries about ATN's new slogan after learning some distressing news from Greg.

programme.title: Succession
programme.desc: When Kendall and Roman are sent to the U.K. to negotiate with their mother, an uninvited Shiv shows up to get answers from her father, who has been dodging her; Rhea's continued presence raises eyebrows among the Roy kids, as Logan seeks her counsel.

programme.title: Succession
programme.desc: The entire Roy clan travels to Logan's hometown of Dundee, Scotland, for a celebration of Logan's 50 years in the business; Kendall becomes enamored with Jennifer, an actress in Willa's play; a former employee proves difficult to silence.

programme.title: Succession
programme.desc: Logan, Kendall, Gerri and Tom testify before Congress; Shiv speaks candidly to Kira, a victim who is set to be a key witness; in Turkey, Roman's business pitch takes a chilling turn.

programme.title: Succession
programme.desc: Logan weighs whether a member of the family, or a top lieutenant, will need to be sacrificed to salvage the company's tarnished reputation. Roman shares his hesitations about a new source of financing, as Kendall suggests a familiar alternative.

programme.desc: A teenager (Saoirse Ronan) navigates a loving but turbulent relationship with her strong-willed mother (Laurie Metcalf) over the course of an eventful and poignant senior year of high school.

programme.title: Shazam! Fury of the Gods
programme.desc: When a vengeful trio of ancient gods arrives on Earth in search of the magic stolen from them long ago, Shazam and his allies get thrust into a battle for their superpowers, their lives, and the fate of the world.

programme.title: Furiosa: A Mad Max Saga
programme.desc: Young Furiosa gets caught in the crossfire of two tyrannical warlords. As the tyrants fight for dominance, Furiosa soon finds herself in a nonstop battle to make her way home.

programme.title: Companion
programme.desc: A weekend getaway at a remote cabin turns to chaos when it's revealed that one of the guests -- a subservient android built for human companionship -- has gone haywire.

programme.title: Unknown
programme.desc: After a serious car accident, a man (Liam Neeson) awakes to find that his wife does not recognize him, that another man has assumed his identity, and that assassins are hunting him.

programme.title: Heretic
programme.desc: A diabolical Mr. Reed ensnares two young missionaries in a terrifying game of cat and mouse when they knock on the wrong door and are forced to prove their faith.

programme.title: Friday After Next
programme.desc: Working as security guards, Craig (Ice Cube) and Day-Day (Mike Epps) run into the thief who stole their Christmas presents.

programme.title: Sixteen Candles
programme.desc: A girl turning 16 likes another girl's guy (Michael Schoeffling) and feels nobody cares about her birthday.

programme.title: The Bank Job
programme.desc: In 1971 London, a car dealer (Jason Statham) and his gang of thieves break into a bank vault and find far more than cash and jewelry.

programme.title: Dune: Part Two
programme.desc: Paul Atreides unites with Chani and the Fremen while seeking revenge against the conspirators who destroyed his family. Facing a choice between the love of his life and the fate of the universe, he must prevent a terrible future only he can foresee.

programme.title: Superman Returns
programme.desc: While Lex Luthor (Jon Peters) plots against him, the Man of Steel (Brandon Routh) tries to reconnect with Lois Lane (Kate Bosworth) and find his place in a world that learned to survive in his absence.

programme.title: Criminal
programme.desc: Hoping to stop a diabolical plot, the CIA implants the memories and skills of a dead agent (Ryan Reynolds) into the mind of a dangerous convict (Kevin Costner).

programme.title: Lady Bird
programme.desc: A teenager (Saoirse Ronan) navigates a loving but turbulent relationship with her strong-willed mother (Laurie Metcalf) over the course of an eventful and poignant senior year of high school.

programme.title: Heretic

programme.title: Hot Tub Time Machine
programme.desc: Following a night of drinking in a ski-resort hot tub, four pals awake in 1986, getting a chance to rewrite the past.

programme.title: Hot Tub Time Machine 2
programme.desc: The magical hot tub sends Lou (Rob Corddry), Nick (Craig Robinson) and Jacob (Clark Duke) to the year 2025 to prevent an unknown assailant from shooting Lou.

programme.title: Ghostbusters
programme.desc: Armed with proton packs, four paranormal investigators (Bill Murray, Dan Aykroyd, Harold Ramis) battle mischievous ghouls in New York.

programme.title: Ghostbusters II
programme.desc: Now the parapsychologists (Bill Murray, Dan Aykroyd) are trying to rid New York of stress-related pink slime.

programme.title: Your Monster
programme.desc: A soft-spoken actress finds her voice again when she meets a terrifying but weirdly charming monster that lives in her closet.

programme.title: Trap
programme.desc: A man and his teenage daughter realize they're at the center of a dark and sinister event while watching a concert.

programme.title: Barbie
programme.desc: Barbie and Ken are having the time of their lives in the colorful and seemingly perfect world of Barbie Land. However, when they get a chance to go to the real world, they soon discover the joys and perils of living among humans.

programme.title: The Descendants
programme.desc: A man (George Clooney) simultaneously struggles with the decision to pull the plug on his comatose wife while facing pressure from relatives to sell 25,000 acres of unspoiled Hawaiian land.

programme.title: X
programme.desc: A group of actors sets out to make an adult film in rural Texas under the noses of their reclusive hosts, but when the elderly couple catches their young guests in the act, the cast finds themselves in a desperate fight for their lives.

programme.title: Pearl
programme.desc: Trapped on an isolated farm, Pearl must tend to her ailing father under the watch of her mother. Lusting for the glamorous life she's seen in movies, Pearl's temptations and repressions collide.

programme.title: MaXXXine
programme.desc: Aspiring movie star and hustler Maxine Minx finally gets her big break. But as a mysterious killer stalks the starlets of 1980s Hollywood, a trail of blood threatens to reveal her sinister past.
